Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) is widely used to characterize electrochemical systems.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: The distribution of relaxation times (DRT) has emerged as a powerful, non-parametric alternative to circumvent the inherent challenges of EIS analysis through equivalent circuits or physical models.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: Recently, deep neural net-works have been developed to estimate the DRT.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: However, this line of research is still in its infancy, and several issues remain unresolved, including the long training time and unknown accuracy of this method.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: Furthermore, deep neural networks have not been used for deconvolving DRTs with negative peaks.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times
Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: A pretraining step is included to decrease the computation time; error analysis allows error esti-mation and the development of error reduction strategies.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: Furthermore, the training loss function is modified to handle DRTs with negative peaks.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: For most cases tested, this new framework outperforms ridge regression.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: Moreover, these advances are validated with an array of synthetic and real EIS spectra from various applications, including lithium-metal batteries, solid oxide fuel cells, and proton exchange membrane fuel cells.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times

Sentencas: Overall, this research opens new avenues for the development and application of the deep-neural-network-based analysis of EIS data.
Titulo: Deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy data using the deep-neural-network-enhanced distribution of relaxation times
